snippet.title: Lamentations Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist today on Steam!
https://partner.steamgames.com/apps/landing/3191800
https://www.yoopergamestudios.com

Try it out for free during the Steam Next Fest Oct 14th-21st 2024!
https://store.steampowered.com/sale/nextfest

Details:
The United States military has been notified about civilians and research groups going missing within what they call "the backrooms". A highly classified entrance into this mysterious complex has been found in an old abandoned building located in Northern Alaska. Enter and explore the complex using a strange and unknown elevator. Go down alone or with your team to search multiple floors of the backrooms for answers and escape with your life!

Features:
- Single-player / Multiplayer Co-op
- PvE Escape-Rooms
- Challenging Difficulties
- 1v1 PvP Wager Extraction
- Boss Monsters
- Steam Leaderboards
- Steam Achievements
- Customizable Loadouts
